artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Tsujiokaya Bunsuke
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: portrait of a woman looking toward PL; woman wears purple kimono with black checked patterning with scrolls and black trim, and a blue and white cloth with darker blue arcs and circles over her PL shoulder; landscape behind woman with mountains, rocks and trees; red cartouche with text in URC, with waves beneath and tree at right
markings: date seal: 子十二  {ne jūni} (Rat 12) | censor seals: 村田 {Murata} | 衣笠 {Kinugasa} | publisher\'s seal: {Tsujioka ya}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Sixty-nine Stations along the Kiso Highway (Kiso rokujūkyū tsugi 木曽六十九驛)
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
title: Distant View of Komagatake at Nojiri Station: (Actor Iwai Shijaku I as) Koyoshi
